â€œGeese, peacocks, and celestial swans,
and cuckoos with beautiful voices fly about.
This mansion is delightful, strewn with flowers,
with many colors, frequented by men and women.
There you stay, goddess of great splendor,
displaying your psychic powers, your many forms.
And these celestial nymphs all around
dance, sing, and delight you.
Goddess of great psychic power, what did you do
as a human being to attain this?
By what means do you have such radiance?
